service.name: /psal203.ps
service.query: SELECT (CASE WHEN NVL(A.CONF_FLAG, 'N') = 'Y' THEN 'T' ELSE 'F' END) AS CONF_FLAG , A.STR_CD , A.DEPT_CD , A.TEAM_CD , A.PC_CD , B.ORG_SHORT_NAME AS ORG_NAME , A.EXE_YM AS YYYYMM , A.CONF_DT , SUM(A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT , SUM(A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT , 100 AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE , 100 AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE FROM DPS.PS_ACTPUMBUN A , DPS.PC_ORGMST B WHERE A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD AND A.STR_CD = B.STR_CD AND A.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_CD AND A.TEAM_CD = B.TEAM_CD AND A.PC_CD = B.PC_CD AND A.STR_CD = ? AND A.DEPT_CD = ? AND A.TEAM_CD = ? AND A.PC_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND A.EXE_YM = ? AND EXISTS ( SELECT MYORG.USER_ID FROM COM.V_MYORG MYORG WHERE MYORG.STR_CD = B.STR_CD AND MYORG.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_CD AND MYORG.TEAM_CD = B.TEAM_CD AND MYORG.PC_CD = B.PC_CD AND MYORG.USER_ID = ? ) AND EXISTS (SELECT PUMBUN_CD FROM DPS.PC_STRPBN WHERE STR_CD = A.STR_CD AND PUMBUN_CD = A.PUMBUN_CD --AND BIZ_TYPE != '5' ) GROUP BY A.CONF_FLAG , A.STR_CD , A.DEPT_CD , A.TEAM_CD , A.PC_CD , B.ORG_SHORT_NAME , A.EXE_YM , A.CONF_DT

, SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '29' THEN A.BFYY_NORM_SAMT ELSE 0 END) ) AS BFYY_NORM_SAMT29 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '29' THEN A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT ELSE 0 END) ) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT29 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '29' THEN A.BFYY_EVT_SAMT ELSE 0 END) ) AS BFYY_EVT_SAMT29 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '29' THEN A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT ELSE 0 END) ) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT29 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '29' THEN A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) AS BFYY_SALE_TAMT29 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '29' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT29 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '29' THEN A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) AS BFYY_PROF_TAMT29 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '29' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT29
, SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '30' THEN A.BFYY_NORM_SAMT ELSE 0 END) ) AS BFYY_NORM_SAMT30 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '30' THEN A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT ELSE 0 END) ) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT30 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '30' THEN A.BFYY_EVT_SAMT ELSE 0 END) ) AS BFYY_EVT_SAMT30 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '30' THEN A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT ELSE 0 END) ) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT30 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '30' THEN A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) AS BFYY_SALE_TAMT30 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '30' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT30 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '30' THEN A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) AS BFYY_PROF_TAMT30 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '30' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT30
, SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '31' THEN A.BFYY_NORM_SAMT ELSE 0 END) ) AS BFYY_NORM_SAMT31 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '31' THEN A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT ELSE 0 END) ) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT31 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '31' THEN A.BFYY_EVT_SAMT ELSE 0 END) ) AS BFYY_EVT_SAMT31 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '31' THEN A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT ELSE 0 END) ) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT31 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '31' THEN A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) AS BFYY_SALE_TAMT31 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '31' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT31 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '31' THEN A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) AS BFYY_PROF_TAMT31 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '31' THEN A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT31 , DECODE(NVL(A.CONF_FLAG,'N'),'N','N','Y') AS CONF_FLAG FROM ( SELECT A.STR_CD , A.DEPT_CD , A.TEAM_CD , A.PC_CD , A.PUMBUN_CD , B.PUMBUN_NAME , (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.EXE_DT,7,2) < 10 THEN SUBSTR(A.EXE_DT,8,1) ELSE SUBSTR(A.EXE_DT, 7,2) END ) AS DT , A.BFYY_NORM_SAMT , A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT , A.BFYY_EVT_SAMT , A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT , A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT , A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT , A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT , A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT , A.BFYY_SALE_CRATE , A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE , A.BFYY_PROF_CRATE , A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE , A.CONF_FLAG FROM DPS.PS_ACTPUMBUN A , DPS.PC_STRPBN B WHERE A.PUMBUN_CD = B.PUMBUN_CD AND A.STR_CD = B.STR_CD AND A.STR_CD = ? AND A.DEPT_CD = ? AND A.TEAM_CD = ? AND A.PC_CD = ? AND A.EXE_YM = ? AND EXISTS ( SELECT MYORG.USER_ID FROM COM.V_MYORG MYORG WHERE MYORG.STR_CD = A.STR_CD AND MYORG.DEPT_CD = A.DEPT_CD AND MYORG.TEAM_CD = A.TEAM_CD AND MYORG.PC_CD = A.PC_CD AND MYORG.PUMBUN_CD = A.PUMBUN_CD AND MYORG.USER_ID = ? ) ) A GROUP BY A.PUMBUN_CD , A.PUMBUN_NAME , A.CONF_FLAG ) A

SELECT DISTINCT A.CONF_FLAG FROM DPS.PS_ACTPUMBUN A WHERE A.STR_CD = ? AND A.ORG_LEVEL = '4' AND A.DEPT_CD = ? AND A.TEAM_CD = ? AND A.PC_CD = ? AND A.EXE_YM LIKE ? || '%' AND A.CONF_FLAG = 'Y' AND EXISTS (SELECT PUMBUN_CD FROM DPS.PC_STRPBN WHERE STR_CD = A.STR_CD AND PUMBUN_CD = A.PUMBUN_CD --AND BIZ_TYPE != '5' )
SELECT DISTINCT 'Y' AS FLAG FROM DPS.PS_ACTPCWEIGHT A WHERE A.STR_CD = ? AND A.DEPT_CD = ? AND A.TEAM_CD = ? AND A.PC_CD = ? AND A.YYYYMM = ?
SELECT A.STR_CD , A.SALE_DT , A.CMPR_DT , A.CMPR_DAY FROM DPS.PS_SCHEDULE A WHERE A.STR_CD = ? AND A.SALE_DT = ?

INSERT INTO DPS.PS_ACTPUMBUN ( STR_CD , EXE_YM , EXE_DT , ORG_CD , PUMBUN_CD , ORG_LEVEL , DEPT_CD , TEAM_CD , PC_CD , BFYY_NORM_SAMT , BFYY_EVT_SAMT , BFYY_SALE_TAMT , BFYY_PROF_TAMT , BFYY_SALE_CRATE , BFYY_PROF_CRATE , ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT , ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT , ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT , ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT , ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE , ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE , ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE , ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE , REG_DATE , REG_ID , MOD_DATE , MOD_ID ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? , SYSDATE , ? )

UPDATE DPS.PS_ACTPUMBUN SET ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT = ? , ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT = ? , ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT = ? , ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT = ? , ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE = ? , ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE = ? , ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE = ROUND(?,2) , ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE = ROUND(?,2) , MOD_DATE = SYSDATE , MOD_ID = ? WHERE STR_CD = ? AND DEPT_CD = ? AND TEAM_CD = ? AND PC_CD = ? AND PUMBUN_CD = ? AND EXE_YM = ? AND EXE_DT = ?
UPDATE DPS.PS_ACTTEAM SET CONF_DT = ? , CONF_ID = ? , CONF_FLAG = ? , MOD_DATE = SYSDATE , MOD_ID = ? WHERE STR_CD = ? AND DEPT_CD = ? AND TEAM_CD = ? AND EXE_YM = ? AND NVL(CONF_FLAG,'N') = ?

UPDATE DPS.PS_ACTPC SET CONF_DT = ? , CONF_ID = ? , CONF_FLAG = ? , MOD_DATE = SYSDATE , MOD_ID = ? WHERE STR_CD = ? AND DEPT_CD = ? AND TEAM_CD = ? AND PC_CD = ? AND ORG_LEVEL = '4' AND EXE_YM = ? AND NVL(CONF_FLAG,'N') = ?

UPDATE DPS.PS_ACTPUMBUN A SET CONF_DT = ? , CONF_ID = ? , CONF_FLAG = ? , MOD_DATE = SYSDATE , MOD_ID = ? WHERE STR_CD = ? AND DEPT_CD = ? AND TEAM_CD = ? AND PC_CD = ? AND ORG_LEVEL = '4' AND EXE_YM = ? AND NVL(CONF_FLAG,'N') = ? AND EXISTS (SELECT PUMBUN_CD FROM DPS.PC_STRPBN WHERE STR_CD = A.STR_CD AND PUMBUN_CD = A.PUMBUN_CD --AND BIZ_TYPE != '5' )
DELETE DPS.PS_ACTPCWEIGHT WHERE STR_CD = ? AND DEPT_CD = ? AND TEAM_CD = ? AND PC_CD = ? AND PUMBUN_CD = ? AND EXE_YM = ? AND EXE_DT = ?
